data.Description3: I'm from Mexico City. I have studied a computer technical career (ETE UNAM) in which I participated in a competicion makin a game with JS; also for 2 years I have been studying in Platzi and the path I have followed is the JS career, right now I am a math student at UNAM. I perform as FrontEnd developer.

Projects.name: Space Hunter (Game)
Projects.description: I developed this game for a competition in preparatory (also known as ”Interprepas”), this game was developed with Js, Tree.js, MysQL, Blender and some developing tools such as GitHub. I learned about 3D Objects rendering, JS asynchronism, I improved my design skills and  it pointed me out what skills I need to improve.

Projects.name: School Web system project
Projects.description: I participated in developing and updating the web system of my Preparatory (system which is still in development). There I performed as Frontend developer, I was responsible for designing user interfaces.

Projects.name: Rockets (Game)
Projects.description: When I first started learn programming, I challenged myself and developed a prompt game; I've learned a lot since that time, it helped me to understand about structures, pointers and cycles.

Skills.Description: I'm proactive, I learn easily and like working in a team.
